name: AzurePipelineYAMLValidator
description: Validate a specified Azure Pipeline YAML file
author: johnlokerse

inputs.name: OrganizationName
inputs.label: Organization Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This describes name of the Azure DevOps organization name.

inputs.name: ProjectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This describes name of the project.

inputs.name: PipelineId
inputs.label: Pipeline Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: This describes the definition id of the pipeline where the YAML needs to be validated.

inputs.name: YamlFilePath
inputs.label: Yaml File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: This describes the path to the YAML file (e.g. ./TestFiles/test.yml).

inputs.name: PersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: This describes the authentication token for Azure DevOps.
